pageContent: Objectives: To assess the potential factors influencing the occurrence of bladder outlet obstruction (BOO) during follow-up after high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) treatment for localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
[Salvage high energy focalized ultrasound (HIFU) in prostate cancer after radiotherapy]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22318182/
